short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 3D preview of products on supported e-shops

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is adding 3D preview of products on supported e-shops.
3D models of products are hosted on sketchfab.com.

Supported e-shops:
https://www.ebay.com/
https://www.amazon.com/
https://www.amazon.de/
https://www.alza.cz/
https://www.alza.sk/
https://www.czc.cz/
https://www.kytary.cz/
https://www.aliexpress.com/
https://www.nike.com/

Badge is indicating when active site is supported.
